column4: Would someone be willing to help me concerning ubuntu Dapper Drake?
Im trying to get ubuntu to autodetect my modem PunjabiFLOYDIAN
I've downloaded "scanmodem" and opened a command line typing in the commands as instructed PunjabiFLOYDIAN
Thank you for your time nonetheless PunjabiFLOYDIAN!!
right, it should give a report of the probed chipset
did you get ModemData.txt in the Modem folder ?
use a pastebin, paste the contents there.
ubotu has directed me to a "paste bin"?
you can't paste in the channel, paste the content in the pastebin and give us the link
did you go thrugh the file? its proved the hardware and has even specified steps to install it!!
